桲字的基本解释

桲
bó
一种打谷脱粒的农具，即连枷。

桲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》蒲没切，入没，並。］
(1)打谷脱粒的工具。即连枷。
(2)见“榅桲”。
(3)见“桲欏”。

桲字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桲； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页527第04
【唐韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲沒切【集韻】薄沒切，?音勃。【玉篇】今連枷，所以打穀也。【揚子·方言】齊、楚、江、淮閒謂之桲。【博雅】杖也。　又【廣韻】榲桲，果名。似?。【洛陽花木記】梨之別種二十七，榲桲其一也。

桲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桲字的起名意思

指一种植物及其果实，如榅桲，又指连枷。

quince
Basic explanation of words
quince
bó
An agricultural tool for threshing and threshing, namely flail.
quince
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" Pu did not cut, enter, merge. ]
(1) Threshing tools. That is flail.
(2) See "Quines".
(3) See "quince".
quince
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桲; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 527 04
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Pu did not cut [Ji Yun] Thin but not cut,? Yin Bo. [Jade articles] Today's flail, so threshing. [Yangtze Dialect] Qi, Chu, Jiang, and Huaixian are called quince. [Bo Ya] Stick also.　[Guangyun] Quince, fruit name. like?. [Luoyang Huamuji] Twenty-seven other kinds of pears, and quince is one of them.
